generator.group: The Florey Institute of Neuroscience and Mental Health

contact.group: The Florey Institute for Neuroscience and Mental Health, University of Melbourne

publications.title: An iPSC line (FINi003-A) from a male with late-onset developmental and epileptic encephalopathy caused by a heterozygous p.E1211K variant in the SCN2A gene encoding the voltage-gated sodium channel Na(v)1.2

donor.disease_description: Late-onset DEE patient carrying a heterozygous missense variant (E1211K) in NaV1.2 (SCN2A)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Normal karyotype without SNP array-detectable abnormalities. Karyotyping at 450–500 band resolution.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: ReproRNA-OK m1 (StemCellTechnologies) polycistronic mRNA (expressing human KLF4 + OCT4/POU5F1 + SOX2 + GLIS1 + c-MYC, plus puromycin N-acetyltransferase protein)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee
